name: block_event_overview
description: Displays the overview for your event with date.

name: block_event_text
description: Displays the text block for an event.

name: block_hero
description: Displays a large hero, typically used at the top of pages.

logo.description: SVG upload recommended. This will use the image's natural size and only shrink on smaller screens. Make sure the image has your most ideal dimensions for desktop set.

name: block_hero_brand
description: Displays a large hero which houses a large central Raw logo.

logo_ticker.description: Upload black and white SVGs for best results.

name: block_impact_details
description: Impactful headline with content for further details.

jaa_partnership.description: Check to display the JAA Partnership.

logos.description: Upload black and white SVGs for best results.

name: block_media
description: Displays an image or Mux video.

name: block_next_event
description: Displays the next available event.

name: block_past_events
description: Displays some recent past events.

name: block_posts
description: Gets latest posts with filtering.

name: block_projects_filtered
description: Select projects to showcase with filtering.

name: block_projects_selected
description: Select projects to showcase with filtering.

name: block_team
description: Display teams of selected people.

name: block_text
description: Generic Text block used for pages like privacy policy etc

name: block_ticker
description: Displays a logo ticker with optional background media & title

logos.description: For best results use SVG images.

name: block_work_text
description: Standard text for Work pages

jaa_partnership.description: Check to display the JAA Partnership.

name: link
description: Creates a link to anywhere

name: logo
description: Creates a link to anywhere

name: mux_video_autoplay
description: Creates a Mux video autoplay.

name: mux_video_player
description: Creates a Mux video player.

poster.description: Image that is shown as the poster for the video before it's played.

preview_image.description: Image that is shown when featured around the site.

preview_text.description: Text that is shown when featured around the site.

event_datetime.description:
If you're creating a new Event, you should create this as an Event content type in the Events folder and not as a Post.

This is used only for legacy events migrated from the old site.

jaa_partnership.description: Check to display the JAA Partnership.

name: post_embed
description: Embed content from YouTube or others.

name: post_gallery
description: Displays a gallery of images in a grid.

name: post_heading
description: Displays a text heading.

name: post_html
description: Renders custom HTML into the page. Use with extreme caution.

html.description: Do not paste code in here you don't understand. It can be very dangerous. Consult a developer. This field is only here for migration purposes of the old website that used custom HTML blocks for video. Once we have a better solution, this field will be removed.

name: post_image
description: Displays a full-width image.

name: post_quote
description: Displays a quote with citation.

name: post_text
description: Displays text content.

name: post_wistia
description: Provide a Wistia video ID to embed into the page.

id.description: Provide the Wistia video ID only.

preview_logo.description: Logo that is shown when featured around the site. SVG upload recommended.

preview_media.description: The Image or video that is shown when featured around the site.

preview_headline.description: Headline that is shown when featured around the site.

preview_text.description: Text that is shown when featured around the site.

name: settings
description: Settings for the global content of the website
